data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Kurigram to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kurigram, Rangpur, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Kurigram, Rangpur, Bangladesh need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Kurigram be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Kurigram to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kotal people.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,592 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, let it be said of the 2,066,708 lost in Kurigram that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the county of Kurigram, Rangpur, Bangladesh has a population of 2,069,300.

We estimate Kurigram has 2,592 people who might know Jesus, 6,208 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,060,500 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Kurigram, Rangpur, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Kurigram
location.people_groups_list: Mallah (Muslim traditions), Rajbansi Pali (Hindu traditions), Kamar, Dai (Muslim traditions), Malto
